original_text: And every male in Abraham’s household, including those born in his household or bought from a foreigner, was circumcised with him.
korean_text: 그 집의 모든 남자 곧 집에서 태어난 자와 돈으로 이방 사람에게서 사온 자가 다 그와 함께 할례를 받았더라

sentences.original_text: And every male in Abraham's household
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아브라함의 집안에 있는 모든 남자는

sentences.original_text: including those born in his household
